resources.string: Thanks again for helping with my move

It\'s not you, it\'s the network.
Looks like there\'s a connectivity issue on our end. Can you give us a few min, then come back and try again?
Your phone appears to be offline or has a poor connection at the moment. Please try again when you\'ve found a stronger signal.
Sorry, you can‚Äôt send this much XTM until your previous transaction(s) are complete. Please wait for at least one transaction to complete and then try again.
Sorry, the amount cannot be less than the fee.
Something went wrong! Please try again later. Please send us a bug report if this problem persists.

The wallet could not be restored. The backup file is not supported. We updated the wallet version, old backup files without a password are not valid anymore. You can download an older version, make a backup with a password and try again.
Transaction not found. Please try again later. Please submit a bug report using the \"Report a Bug\" option from the settings menu if this problem appears again.
Contact not found. Please try again later. Please submit a bug report using the \"Report a Bug\" option from the settings menu if this problem appears again.
Wallet was not encrypted but a passphrase was supplied. Please try again later or try to restore your wallet.
Unable to decrypt the wallet. Please try again later or try to restore your wallet.
Unable to recover your wallet from provided seed words. Please check the list of entered seed words and try again.
The provided seed words are not compatible with the current wallet version. Please get in touch with support for more details.
Looks like your backup isn\'t compatible with this wallet version. Consider making a new one!
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
We need access to %s to perform this action. Please, open the Settings app, find this permission in the list, and grant it
This feature is currently under construction. We\'re working hard to bring it to you soon. Stay tuned!
Tap to see full Emoji ID
Your phone is either offline or has a poor connection at the moment. We\'ll wait here until you find some stronger signal.
Import wallet if you\'re already mining on desktop
Are you sure you want to cancel wallet creation? You will lose all progress.
By creating a wallet, you agree to the terms\nof the
We‚Äôre off to a great start!
Now, let‚Äôs create your Emoji ID.
Your Emoji ID is your wallet address.\nIt‚Äôs how people can find you and send you XTM.
Your Emoji ID is your wallet‚Äôs address,\nand how others can find you and send you XTM.
Sleep well at night knowing you‚Äôve taken precautions to keep your XTM wallet safe and sound.
Please enter your biometrics. Tari Universe Wallet will require it each time you open the app.
Please enter your biometrics to unlock your wallet.
Please enter your smartphone\'s screen lock PIN, passcode, or pattern to unlock your wallet.
Tari Universe Wallet was not able to authenticate you. Do you still want to proceed?
The QR code is a deep link request to assign your wallet to use this base node.

Nothing to show here yet. Keep an eye on this screen to stay updated on the status of your transactions. Oh, and remember, you can also use the request function to ask someone to send you some Tari if you want!
Enter Emoji ID or Contact Name
You don‚Äôt have any activity yet.
Once you receive some XTM, you‚Äôll see it here.
Your wallet has been successfully restored.
This is everything you\'ve earned or received, including rewards that are still locked or pending.
This is the amount you can use right now. Some rewards take time to unlock or confirm.
Log in and link your Tari Airdrop account to view your mining stats and track airdrop rewards.
Earn gems by mining and referring friends to increase your airdrop reward during testnet!
Your friends must use download the Tari Universe desktop app with YOUR referral code AND start mining for you to earn gem rewards.
Are you sure you want to disconnect your Airdrop account? You will no longer be able to view your mining stats or track airdrop rewards.
Hi! Please send me %s Tari(s) using this link: %s
Scan Tari QR code in the box below
Invalid QR Code.\nYour request cannot be processed at this time.
Not enough XTM in your available balance
Sorry, you can‚Äôt send this much XTM. Please wait for at least one transaction to complete and then try again.
Let the recipient know what the payment is for
Your transaction is on its way...
Are you sure you want to leave this screen? Your transaction may be cancelled.
Transacting in person? Others can scan this QR code from the Tari Universe Wallet App to send you XTM.
Your previously connected Yat has lost sync with the app. Click Connect Yats below if you\‚Äôd like to reconnect it.
Easily receive XTM from others by sharing your profile via one of the following methods:
You can\‚Äôt delete your name. Give it a quick update instead!
An error occurred while retrieving the Payment ID
Waiting for recipient to come online
Waiting for sender to complete transaction
You will have to start a new transaction if you change your mind.
Payment ID address. Please be aware that this address can\'t be saved to your contacts list.
The transaction failed for an unknown reason.
The transaction was canceled by the sender.
The transaction failed due to timeout.
The transaction was cancelled as it is spending funds that have already been spent.
The transaction was cancelled due to some funds being spent no longer being present in the chain.
This transaction was cancelled due to the funds not having reached their time-lock period yet.
The transaction failed to the invalid input data. This situation shouldn\'t happen. Please send a bug report or contact us directly.
The transaction was not cancelled, but for some reason looks like cancelled. Please, contact us directly if you see this message.
The transaction fee is distributed to the thousands of computers (also known as \"miners\") who ensure that your XTM transactions are fast and secure.
Share this with anyone who needs to confirm your payment ‚Äì they can look it up on a block explorer while your privacy stays protected.
Waiting for %s block confirmations (%s of %s confirmed)
Unable to open file. Please try again later
Has something gone wrong? Please let us know!
With this bug report you will send us information about your device model, Android version and recent logs
Select a theme below to change the color scheme
Seems that there are no applications to handle link sharing.
Please select the network to which you want to connect
You will be logged out and switched to a different network. Do you want to continue?

Screen recording and taking screenshots can capture your wallet data and transactions. To keep your wallet data private, you can disable this setting.\n\nNote: Screen recording and screenshots will always be disabled for the Seed Phrase screen.
You will be able to record your screen. Are you sure you want to proceed?
Oops! Screenshots are disabled in this app to keep your information safe. Thanks for keeping things secure!

Please double-check that your wallet is backed up before deleting it from this device. If you proceed, you will LOSE ALL YOUR FUNDS, your contact data and your transaction history. If this is definitely what you want, go ahead.
Last chance! We\'re about to delete your wallet from this device. You will irreversibly lose your entire balance. Are you 100% sure we should do this?
By backing up your wallet, you‚Äôll ensure that you don‚Äôt lose your XTM if your phone is lost or broken.
This could take between 1 to 3 minutes.\nPlease keep the app open
No backup available.\nCreate a backup using Google Drive first
Are you sure you want to proceed?
Carefully write these 24 words down in order, and keep the paper somewhere secure where others can\'t access it. Do not take a screenshot.
I understand that if I lose my recovery seed phrase I will not be able to restore my wallet.
Error while getting the wallet seed phrase. Please try again later.
Select the words in the correct order.
Tap on the words below in the correct order
Wallet could not be restored. Backup does not exist.
The QR code you scanned does not contain valid paper wallet seeds
You just scanned a wallet from the Tari Universe desktop app! Syncing it will let you track your real-time XTM balance right on your phone.\nWhat would you like to do?
Do you want to back up your current wallet before replacing it? If you don\‚Äôt back it up first, you will lose all the funds in your current wallet!
Enter the identification code from your Tari Universe desktop app to import your wallet.
The identification code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Enter your seed phrase to restore your wallet
Oops, looks like the address you entered isn\'t good. We had to revert your change.
At least one of the entered seed words is invalid. Please review them and try again
You entered not enough seed words. Please add some more and try again
Unable to generate key from seed words. Please check your seed words and try again
Connection established. The process will start soon
Unable to connect with base node. Please try again later
Unable to recover your wallet due to the error
here are no suggestions for the phrase
Are you sure you want to cancel?
You will lose your progress, but don\'t worry, you can always start over.
Your real-time XTM balance is now available on your phone. üöÄ
Enter your backup password in order to change it to something different

We\'re always striving to make Tari Universe Wallet better.\nTo achieve this, we use a third-party service to gather non-identifiable data like crash logs and usage statistics. This data helps us pinpoint and fix any issues, ultimately improving your experience

We're always striving to make Tari Universe Wallet better.
To achieve this, we use a third-party service to gather non-identifiable data like crash logs and usage statistics. This data helps us pinpoint and fix any issues, ultimately improving your experience.

Do you consent to your data being collected?

We\'re dedicated to enhancing the security and convenience of Tari Universe Wallet\'s authorization process. To achieve this, we integrate a reliable Android native service for biometric authentication. Your unique biometric data ensures secure and effortless access to the application, simplifying your user experience.
If you are in a country or using a connection that censor Tor, you might need to use bridges

Available formates:
‚Ä¢ obfs4 <IP ADDRESS>:<PORT> <FINGERPRINT> cert=<CERTIFICATE> iat-mode=<value>
example:
obfs4 192.95.36.142:443 CDF2E852BF539B82BD10E27E9115A31734E378C2 cert=qUVQ0srL!JI/vO6V6m/24anYXiJD3QP2HgzUKQtQ7GRqqUvs7P+tG43RtAqdhLOALP7DJQ iat-mode=1

 ‚Ä¢ <IP ADDRESS>:<PORT> <FINGERPRINT>
example:
78.156.103.189:9301 2BD90810282F8B331FC7D47705167166253E1442"
Can\'t connect to the bridge because: %s
Trying to connect to the TOR
Connecting to TOR connection was established successfully\n

Once you have some funds, you‚Äôll be able to view your coins here.
Into how many parts would you like to break these coins?
Your coins will be combined soon.\nKeep an eye on the transactions screen to\nsee when it‚Äôs been mined.
Your coin will be broken soon.\nKeep an eye on the transactions screen to\nsee when it‚Äôs been mined.
You are about to join these coins.
You are about to break this coin.
Ensure your wallet is safe even if your storage is compromised. Select a password you will remember or
you will not be able to recover your wallet
Enter the password you created in Tari Universe Wallet to secure your backups. If you cannot find the password,
you will not be able to recover your wallet
Funds recovered from your previous wallet
The data stored locally is incompatible with the current version of the App or with the network itself. We strongly recommend removing the wallet and creating a new one
I still want to use the wallet

You now have real money in your wallet.

If you accidentally delete your wallet app or lose your device, your funds are lost, and there is no way to recover them unless you have safely kept a copy of your seed phrase safe somewhere.

Click \'Ok\' to review and save the phrase now, or \'Remind me later\' to do it at a more convenient time

Your wallet now holds a fair amount of value, which you probably don't want to lose. Unlike a physical wallet's notes, it's possible to make a copy of your wallet's contents that you can use to recover your funds in case you lose them.

You should think about making a copy of your wallet's coins, which we will keep up to date after every transaction.

If you have a copy of your seed phrase saved somewhere safe, and don't want to back up your coins into the cloud, you can skip this step.
Encrypt your wallet with a password

It's awesome that you're using [this Tari wallet] so much! You're a high-roller, so it's time to add another layer of security to your wallet backups.

Your funds will be safer if we encrypt your cloud backups with an additional password of your own choosing.

You need to make sure that this password is very strong and that YOU DO NOT FORGET it!

(Whatever happens, you can always restore from your seed phrase, so make sure you're still keeping this safe and secreted away).

As an added benefit, password-encrypted backups allow us to backup your transaction history as well!

Your mobile wallet holds way more funds than would normally be considered safe to walk around with in your pocket.\n\nYou should really consider sweeping most of your balance into a cold- or hardware wallet.
Set Up My Cold Wallet Address

Your seed phrase lets you recover your wallet directly from the blockchain if you ever lose access to it. If you only ever do one thing to back up your wallet, complete this step.\n Write down the seed phrase on a piece of paper and store it somewhere safe. Anyone who knows the seed phrase has full access to your wallet. Don\'t store seed phrases online
You may backup your wallet to a cloud provider of your choice, with a simple password-less approach. Your funds are safe as long as your cloud account is secure

We recommend upgrading the security of your increasingly bulging wallet with a strong password. Keep this password safe. You can\'t restore your wallet without it. (You can always recover your wallet from your seed phrase)
Try to keep your seed words and backups in a safe place. We also strongly recommend keeping a few copies of your seed words in different places and changing the backup password regularly
Tari Universe Wallet helps you secure your funds
. This step is triggered when you receive funds for the first time, but you can apply any step at any time from the settings
. This step is triggered when your balance exceeds %s for the first time, but you can apply any step at any time from the settings
Oh no, it‚Äôs empty in here!
Looks like you don‚Äôt have any contacts that we can link to yet. Once you‚Äôve added a contact, you‚Äôll be able to link to their profile.
Looks like your phone‚Äôs contact book is empty. Once you‚Äôve added a contact, you‚Äôll be able to link to their profile.

Tari Universe Wallet doesn‚Äôt currently have permission to access your phone‚Äôs contacts. If you would like to link to an existing contact, please click below and grant permission to the app to read from your contact book.
An error occurred while trying to access your phone‚Äôs contacts. Please try again later.
You can quickly associate an Emoji ID or Yat with a contact already present in your phone. Simply click on a name below and it will be linked to:
Enter Emoji ID, Contact Name or Yat
Scan QR code or Enter Address
You can‚Äôt add your own Tari wallet address to your contact book
You can‚Äôt send Tari to your own Tari wallet address
You are about to permanently remove this contact. Are you sure?
Unfortunately, there are no applications that could open this type of address. Try to install corresponding application
Keep track of your contacts by saving them in the contact book. To add a new contact, tap the "add contact" icon at the top of the page

You can add a new contact by tapping on the "add contact" icon at the top of the page. Tari Universe Wallet can also automatically detect contacts with Tari addresses on you phone. We‚Äôll need your permission to access your existing contact book to do this
You can favorite contacts to easily access them later. Tap on the contact‚Äôs name and then on the star icon to add them to your favorites list
Grant app access to my contacts
Tari Universe Wallet was unable to get data from the Yat service. Some contact details may be unavailable
A contact without a name? That won\‚Äôt work. Please add one to keep things running smoothly.
Save your friends and favourite\ncontacts right here!
Awesome! Your details have been shared successfully.
%s contacts will be added to your contact book
You don\‚Äôt have any transactions with %s yet.
Just tap the \'New Message\' icon up top to kick things off!
Enter your passcode to log in
Looks like there are %s very similar addresses in your contact book. Please double check that you‚Äôre sending to the right one!
Marking a contact as trusted means you trust this person and we won‚Äôt ask you to double check the address again.
